name: Ball Slinger - New Update
description:
Ball Singer! A funny and cool short game to play with a friend or someone if you are bored. 

WINDOWS EDITION WILL NO LONGER RECEIVE UPDATES AFTER V0.3.1 TRANSFORMATION TO ANDROID

[UPDATE 0.3.3, 0.4.0]

  • Big UI Improvements, Theme changed, Useless text has been removed
  • Android Graphic Bug has been Fixed!
  • Android Lag has been fixed
  • Optimizations for the game
  • Controls Improvements
  • Resolution Improvements
  • Game Performance Improved
  • Game Size Decreased
  • Added Gameplay : BOT/A.I
  • Added Changelog menu
